messages.messageBody:
http://www.bakusin.com/eiketu/jyoketu.html

Pages about Yamamoto Yaeko and Matsuo Taseko (previously discussed):

http://www.bakusin.com/eiketu/yae.html

http://www.bakusin.com/eiketu/taseko.html

Have uploaded both pictures to the Photos "Shinsengumi and Related
People" section. Also of interest--
http://www.bakusin.com/eiketu/sanako.html Bio of Chiba Sanako,
Watsuki's basis for Kamiya Kaoru.

--M.
